channel.title: commute on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in commute on Barefoot Rob

item.title: trains moe joe
item.description: 19:13 Monday 05 December 2016 JST Bah I chose the wrong door to get on the train; there are fewer seats available here so I’m sitting on the bumper next to the wheel chair space, propping my computer on the rail beside me, holding it down with my left wrist while I write. Basically it’s the worst thing I can do for my wrist; I can feel it burning. Okay fine I’ll just chill and hope a seat opens up.
